channel.title: Need a coder
channel.description: I need a coder to help me add full rune crafting full fishing full cooking burning and a rune ess mining place. you can also add your name to desighned by you. I will pay you in reward of Admin. I also need command's like ::fish ::rc ::ess ::cook post if you can help me thank you. :D

item.title: Need a coder
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You should really try to learn this yourself instead of relying on other people to do it for you. After all, that’s how the people who are helping you learned how to do it. And wouldn’t it be alot more convenient to be able to do it yourself, since you won’t have to flood your server with admins?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a coder
item.dc:creator: @ugetpkd ugetpkd
item.description:
@ugetpkd wrote:

[quote=“pregg, post:40, topic:139660”][quote author=ugetpkd link=topic=191655.msg1731030#msg1731030 date=1188883511]

[quote author=pregg link=topic=191655.msg1731026#msg1731026 date=1188883430]

Dear People.
yes I would love you to help.
If you want to be paid rs 2 gold I will.
this is what I need done.
Full fishing I want the fishing spot located at cammy fishing spot and emote’s with auto fishing. I want rune crafting alter’s with all alter’s including blood alter and emote’s aswell I want the alter’s in the abssy.
I want a rune ess mining place with emote’s aswell placed where norm rs place is.
I want full cooking and burning with emote’s.
I want these command’s ::fish ::rc ::es ::cook
that is about it.

[/quote] you want a miracle…your on moparscape…like 5 people on here could actualy do that…

no it isn’t dude I know O M G can do it MOd Adam can do it but they are busy working on somthing.
[/quote] Thats two. Seriously. like maby 10 people here know java. The rest just think they do.[/quote]
let me add 3,4 frugooscape and kupo oh wait let me add 5 zenzie.
my programing uncle can do it but he is working on somthing for his work.
